summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Confectionary CRM system. Backend API tests: 100% success rate (16/16 tests passed). Frontend UI tests: All major functionality working. Fixed critical Settings page bug. All CRUD operations, authentication, dashboard, calendar, and theme switching working correctly.
